com.github.lb.stindex.spatial.sfc.zorder

Class ZOrderUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.tm.stindex.spatial.sfc.zorder.ZOrderUtils

  • public class ZOrderUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenience methods used to decode/encode Z-Order space filling curve values (using a simple bit-interleaving approach).
